      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The mercury-in-glass thermometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Quecksilber-in-Glas Thermometer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le thermomètre de mercure-dans-verre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O termômetro do mercúrio-em-vidro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il termometro del mercurio-in-vetro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το θερμόμετρο υδράργυρος-$$$-ΓΥΑΛΙΟΎ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El termómetro del mercurio-en-cristal</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows how the expansion and contraction of liquids like mercury can be used to measure temperatures.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">contraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">expansion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">material properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mercury thermometer</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, wie die Expansion und die 
Kontraktion der Flüssigkeiten wie Quecksilber verwendet werden 
können, um Temperaturen zu messen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre comment l'expansion et 
la contraction des liquides comme le mercure peuvent être employées 
pour mesurer les températures.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra como a expansão e a 
contração dos líquidos como o mercúrio podem ser usadas medir 
temperaturas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra come l'espansione e 
la contrazione dei liquidi come mercurio possono essere usate per 
misurare le temperature.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση επιδεικνύει πώς η επέκταση και η 
συστολή των υγρών όπως τον υδράργυρο μπορούν να χρησιμοποιηθούν 
για να μετρήσουν τις θερμοκρασίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra cómo la extensión y 
la contracción de líquidos como el mercurio se pueden utilizar para 
medir temperaturas.</string>
          </description>
